name: Hexacate
description:
INSTALLING VIRUS.EXE...

Uh oh.. Looks like you just activated a virus.

Quick! Activate the antivirus!

Keep your core safe to keep the antivirus running, while protecting the system.

Controls

A and D to move the core

Left Click to kill virus and interact with interfaces

How to Play

1. Kill the virus by clicking on them.

2. Open the system by pressing the button on top right of the screen. If any of the folder's bar gets to zero you will lose. So click on them to recover it!

3. Protect the core from the virus (if the core is damaged, it'll decrease the antivirus progression)

4. Get the antivirus to 100% to win!

Credits

Music: 8-bit Aggressive1 - https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play1982.html
